Hello there!

I am a doctoral researcher at the Collaborative Research Center ([SFB 1102](https://sfb1102.uni-saarland.de)) in Saarland University where [Prof. Jutta Kray](https://www.uni-saarland.de/lehrstuhl/kray/team/jk.html) and [Prof. Vera Demberg](https://www.uni-saarland.de/lehrstuhl/demberg/members/verademberg.html) are my PhD supervisors.

My [research](https://sites.google.com/view/pratik-bhandari/home) focuses on how we make sense of the spoken language under adverse listening conditions.
I study when (and how) the linguistic context helps us understand degraded speech.

I come from <span>&#x1F1F3;&#x1F1F5;</span>Nepal. So obviously, I have not climbed the ‚õ∞Ô∏è Sagarmatha.
